BTNY365.title: Research Skills
BTNY365.description: Guided work and assignments in literature research, evaluation and criticism of published papers, essay writing, and data analysis.
BTNY365.prerequisites: 54 points at 200-level or above from Science Schedule C

BTNY261.title: Plant Physiology and Biotechnology
BTNY261.description: The biology, physiology and biotechnology of plants. Research topics in Plant Physiology and Biotechnology.

BTNY269.title: Principles of Nature Conservation
BTNY269.description: The application of ecological principles to nature conservation.
